pkgmetadata.longdescription: ROC Curves for Multi-Class Analysis // Function multiroc() can be used for computing and visualizing Receiver Operating Characteristics (ROC) and Area Under the Curve (AUC) for multi- class classification problems. It supports both One-vs-One approach by M.Bishop, C. (2006, ISBN:978-0-387-31073-2) and One-vs-All approach by Murphy P., K. (2012, ISBN:9780262018029).
